children.text: We’re a web design & development couple based in Greece,
with a passion for for making your brand pixel perfect.
Every business has it’s own unique story to tell,

At Calisto,we aim to not only provide websites that are visually appealing but that also perform flawlessly. Through custom code and design, we know how to make your website perform its best, leaving you feeling even better.
Your site is meant to speak for you before you even need to say a word. We design high end and scalable websites that make your audience stay (and scroll).
From logo to typography and overall tone, together we build a brand that reflects you, not just another Pinterest board. We pull out what makes you different and build a visual identity around it.
We create fully custom websites that are designed to grow with you - fast loading and responsive, allowing your sit to move as smoothly as your brand deserves.
At Calisto it’s the little things that set us apart.

Opening yourself up to noticing beauty in the small, everyday moments in life is what enhances creativity and that’s what makes our approach different. It’s the little things that set us apart-because that’s what makes a website stand out. No one size fits all design, everything is custom built to reflect your brand’s personality.
We’re a small in house team of two and can ensure you will have direct and open communication with us both. Any changes and questions? We’re here!
From design to development, everything is built from scratch so that we can guarantee a fully customized website to your brand’s needs.
Your website will work on all different devices and look great. Phone, tablet or laptop, our websites are created for optimal user experience.

Embolden started as a passion project born from our love of reading and the challenges we faced as readers. Struggling with focus, slow reading speeds, and hard-to-read fonts, we realized we weren’t alone. We wanted a solution that would make reading feel effortless and enjoyable—not just for us but for everyone.

Through leveraging the principles of bionic reading, our goal was to create a free, accessible tool that transforms the reading experience, guiding the reader’s focus naturally, helping them read faster and with greater ease.
Everything included in the Single Page package +
Everything included in the Standard package +
WEB DESIGN STUDIO THAT ALLOWS YOU TO BRING YOUR BUSINESS’
TRANSFORMING YOUR IDEAS INTO STUNNING DIGITAL EXPERIENCES
What we can do for you
CUSTOM WEB DESIGN SERVICES THAT TAKE CARE OF YOUR ONLINE NEEDS

Being a couple with a shared passion for creating digital experiences, we bring a personal, hands-on approach to every project. Combining our individual strengths - creativity and technical skill - we craft custom, personalized websites that both, reflect your brand's personality, and drive results. With a clear focus on the business' individual needs, we use a collaborative approach that results in a website you are proud to call your own.
HERE’S A LOOK AT THE SERVICES WE OFFER

We’re not just a web design and development agency—we’re a creative partnership forged through years of shared experiences and a passion for innovation. Growing up together in Greece, we’ve combined our cultural influences and technical expertise to craft digital solutions that truly reflect our clients’ visions. Our journey is as unique as the websites we build, and we’re excited to share it with you.

Our web design services focus on creating custom,visually stunning & user-friendly websites that not only look great but also function seamlessly. We combine our understanding of design principles with the latest trends to craft a digital experience that resonates with your target audience. From responsive layouts to intuitive navigation, every element is tailored to reflect your brand's unique identity.
Web development is about taking thee design and building it into a responsive site. From Seo friendly structure, custom functionality to any animations, it all comes to life during this stage.

Here, we take who you and your brand are and turn it into something that’s instantly recognizable. From creating a logo to building out your custom brand identity, every element here is tailored to reflect how unique your business is.
From first idea to final click, here's how we bring your vision to life, one step at a time.
We start off by getting to know you- your story, your goals and what makes you stand out. Then, we map out a plan that feels exciting and that makes sense for your business.
Now, we get to the creative part! We’ll show you mockup designs, moodboards and color palettes. You give us feedback and we tweak until you’re happy.
Once the design is just right, we begin custom building it out and testing it to make sue it runs smoothly on every device.

Ok, this is officially the big moment! We launch your site for the world to see whilst guiding you through what’s next for you. Oh, and don’t worry we offer ongoing customer support so we’ll be by your side even after your site goes live.

We’re all about combining our individual strengths in order to create something great. As a couple we work well together, each bringing complementary skills of both design and technical know how, guaranteeing a high performing website that also looks pretty cool.

From meeting for the first time at school in Greece, to reuntiting years later after our studies abroad back in our hometown, we knew we wanted to create something of our own, together. Calisto has been our opportunity to combine each of our passions and strenghths - creativity & technical skill - to create something that allows us to bring your ideas and visions into pixel perfect reality whilst also making our wildest dreams come true.

It’s always about open & clear communication for us. The only way to make your website perfectly you is if we know what you want (and don’t want). Being a team of two makes that easy; direct line of communication to us both so that any questions are answered quickly and in turn, creating the best possible result for you.
We love a plan but change doesn’t scare us. We believe that staying flexible and open to pivotting is what garners the best results as creativity thrives when you’re not stuck in one lane.
We are naturally curious and that definitely shows in our work process Curiosity fuels our work process- we’re always learning and discovering new ways to make design feel exciting and different.
We’d love to hear from you!
Don’t hesitate to reach out to us regarding any of our services or with any inquiry you may have.
